plot: When a teenage girl suffers a Judo injury, her coach forbids her from competing in the tournament that would earn her a black-belt.
title: Judo Girl
plot_es: When a teenage girl suffers a Judo injury, her coach forbids her from competing in the tournament that would earn her a black-belt.
plot_en: When a teenage girl suffers a Judo injury, her coach forbids her from competing in the tournament that would earn her a black-belt.
